Title: The Movie DB Wrapper
Description:
This is a wrapper for the web service being provided by The Movie Db (TMDb). This is being developed for .Net 4.0 and Silverlight 4.

TMDb Information: 
Website: http://www.themoviedb.org/ 
Webservice API: http://api.themoviedb.org/

In order to use this wrapper you must first request an API key from TMDb
HomeWiki:
This is a wrapper for the web service being provided by The Movie Db (TMDb). This is being developed for .Net 4.0 and Silverlight 4.

TMDb Information:
Website: http://www.themoviedb.org/
Webservice API: http://api.themoviedb.org/

In order to use this wrapper you must first request an API key from TMDb


Note: Project has basic functionality only

Working Queries Include:
*Movie.search
*Movie.getInfo
*Movie.ImdbLookup
*Movie.Browse
*Person.Search
*Person.getInfo
